name: api-lets-play
description: An api of the website let's play that aims to organize lobbies of differents matches of differents sports

scripts.build: tsc && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.dev:empty: dotenv -e .env.test prisma migrate dev && dotenv -e .env.test nodemon src/server.ts
scripts.dev:full: dotenv -e .env.test prisma migrate dev && dotenv -e .env.test prisma db seed && dotenv -e .env.test nodemon src/server.ts

author: Victor Hugo Borges Sim√µes (github: https://github.com/VicterHuger)
